title: Calories in a Cinnabon
meta_description: Discover calories in a Cinnabon, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, protein, fat, and tips for variations under 160 characters.
assumptions: Standard classic Cinnabon roll with cream cheese frosting; approximately 148g serving size, freshly baked.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, size, and customizations. Check Cinnabon menu or packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A classic Cinnabon roll packs about 880 calories, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a classic Cinnabon?
What are the carbs in a Cinnabon?
faqs.a: About 119 g of carbohydrates, including 58 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a Cinnabon high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 36 g total fat, with 16 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much protein in a Cinnabon?
faqs.a: Around 13 g of protein per roll.
Minis have about 220 kcal each; pecanbon or caramel variants may vary slightly.
